E-Load 
Book More Loads!
E-load is a tool for freight dispatchers that helps minimize the time spent trying to send emails and check mc numbers.
Usually it would take 32 seconds for a normal dispatcher to check an mc number then send them an email.
With E-Load it only takes 10 seconds to complete it all.
E-load comes with a free mc number lookup feature for just a limited time.
It also comes with 25 FREE emails for you to try the extension out.
Only Available On DAT ONE!
